Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Edward R. Murrow has set up a conference for me with his Japanese office
in Tokyo,which will be as a member of the Board of Directors of the NAEB.
If you feel that this meeting can be of sufficient significance and that I
can be of service to NAEB in this capacity, I will appreciate your support.
Previously, in discussing this matter, you signified your willingness to
supplement my trip to the tune of two or three hundred dollars, if the
matter was justified. Your interest and assistance in this matter will be
sincerely appreciated.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours.
Director, Region II
RDH/ml
